CustomField.formula: Amount_Financed__c *((1+ Finance_Compound_Interest__c )^ ( Finance_Term__c * Finance_Compound__c / 12)) -( Finance_Compound_Payment__c )*( ( (1+ Finance_Compound_Interest__c )^( Finance_Term__c * Finance_Compound__c / 12) - 1 ) /Finance_Compound_Interest__c )
CustomField.label: Finance Principal After Term
